casebody.data:
No. 596,

Misc.

Green v. United States. Petitioner pro se. Solicitor General Rankin, Assistant Attorney General Wilkey, Beatrice Rosenberg and Felicia Dubrovsky for the United States.

Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit granted limited to question No. 3 presented by the petition which reads as follows:

“3. Whether the judgment was invalidated where the court did not offer the petitioner an opportunity to speak before sentence was imposed.”

Case transferred to the appellate docket.
